templeHalls.explanation: If I see a SNAKE, say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over it! If I see BLOW DARTS, say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck. And hey, if we spot some COINS lying around before the treasure room, say Alexa Speechcon: aha! to pick them up!
Bad news! The SWING AXE traps are working now! Say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to not lose your hair, or worse!
There are lots of RATS here now! Shout Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over them!

cryptRoom.explanation: Those FLOOR SPIKES are still very pointy! Say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to hop over them!
The ground doesn't look very stable up ahead! If we get to a COLLAPSING FLOOR, shout Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over!
That snapping sounds like a CROCODILE! Use a tasty steak to distract it by shouting Alexa Speechcon: yum!

templeEscape.explanation: There are ARROWS up ahead! Say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to get down!
I think some big jungle cats got into the temple! If we find a JAGUAR, shout Alexa Speechcon: yum! to keep it busy with a juicy steak.
There are nasty POISON GAS booby traps around here! Say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to duck under and not breath it in!

outToSea.explanation: If we see underwater COINS, say Alexa Speechcon: aha! to pull them up. If we see rocks up ahead, say Alexa Speechcon: wowzer! to avoid them. Remember to say a friendly Alexa Speechcon: ahoy! to to SAILORS so they don't attack us!
MERMAIDS live around here! Say Alexa Speechcon: ahoy! to be nice to them, otherwise they might think we're pirates!
I think there are some BARREL BOMBS floating in these waters. Shout Alexa Speechcon: wowzer! To avoid them!

perilousWaters.explanation: There be evil PIRATES in these waters! Shout Alexa Speechcon: whammo! to shoot the cannons at them!
I'm afraid the PIRATE QUEEN is after us! Say Alexa Speechcon: whammo! to keep her away with our cannons!
Lots of WHIRLPOOLS around here! Say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to speed through the rough waters!

shipwreckBay.explanation: BIG WAVES coming up! Say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to speed up and get over the wave!
See that? It's a giant SEA SNAKE is trying to get our ship. Shout Alexa Speechcon: kerpow! to fight it off with a harpoon.
They say the legendary KRAKEN is back! If we spot it, shout Alexa Speechcon: kerpow! to keep it away with a giant harpoon!

theVillage.explanation: Say Alexa Speechcon: aha! to grab COINS. When the the thief runs into a WALL, shout Alexa Speechcon: woo hoo! If he falls into a MOAT, say Alexa Speechcon: splash!
The sneaky thief thinks he can slow us down with TOMATOES. Say Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to dodge them!
The thief thinks he can outswim us across a POND! Let's stay right behind him by shouting Alexa Speechcon: splash! to swim!

castleGrounds.explanation: There are thorny ROSE BUSHES around here! Say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over them and not get pricked!
Careful! I think BABY DUCKS like playing in this area! Say Alexa Speechcon: whee! to jump over them!
King Max said hungry TROLLS now roam these lands! Say Alexa Speechcon: uh oh! to find a good hiding spot when one is near!

dragonAttack.explanation: I can't believe it! A DRAGON in the sky! Shout Alexa Speechcon: uh oh! to take cover when it comes by.
Now the thief is going to throw BEEHIVES at us! Shout Alexa Speechcon: yikes! to dodge them and not get stung!
Is that a SLEEPING GIANT in the way? Shout Alexa Speechcon: woo hoo! to climb right over him!
